TEI.2.document_title: William S. Lewis to Stephen F. Austin, 11-26-1821

barker_notes.barker_footnotes: This and several letters to follow have been Polished in the Texas History Teachers' Bullitin (University of Texas). They are included here because the Bulletin is limited to local circulation. This letter appeared in the issue for November, 1917
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 437

div1.p: $20 Due On Demand to Judge Austin for Cash Loand Twenty Dollars
